column4: Hi everyone! Would anyone happen to be familiar with how to print from a linux box (running 9.04, CUPS, Samba) to a shared printer on a windows box? I can find the folder of the shared printer in the network, but I'm lost as to what to do from there... Any ideas?

Hi everyone! Would anyone happen to be familiar with how to print from a linux box (running 9.04, CUPS, Samba) to a shared printer on a windows box? I can find the folder of the shared printer in the network, but I'm lost as to what to do from there... Any ideas? I just installed CUPS, but I have no idea how to even use it...
the printer is on an windows box and the box is configured as print server?
that is correct. the printer is plugged via USB and shared over the network.
i use at work an 8.04 and the printers are also at an windows box ... you need a howto use the printer over network?
yes please  :)   I just need to know how to print from the ubuntu box to the windows print server
all the stuff I've googled is out of date
ya... the most recent walk-through I could find was from 2007   :(:(
try the link ubottu gives you, may you look also at wiki...
oh!!  I found it... it was way easy. There's an option in Administration > Printing for a network printer   :P
:) good, i just tried, but have here no network printer ;)
